alert.note: Alert for Covington; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 7:14AM CDT until June 19 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southwestern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 713 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of East Brewton, or 9 miles east of Brewton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Escambia and southwestern Covington Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
